articles.description: Excellent play from Aaron Cresswell, Pablo Fornals and Michail Antonio set up an easy tap-in for Tomas Soucek to give West Ham a 1-0 win against Wolves
articles.content: West Ham might appear outsiders in the top-four race but they are not going away. Under David Moyes they always find a way to hang in there, and that is what happened here: victory over Wolves was vi… [+4678 chars]
